DOC.brief_summary: A Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Double-Blind, Parallel-Group, Multi- Site Phase 2b Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of 8-Week Regimens of NVXT topical product in Patients with Mild to Moderate Onychomycosis
DOC.brief_title: Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Double-Blind, Parallel-Group, Multi-Site Phase 2b Clinical Study
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate safety and tolerability of the two regimens of NVXT (Treatment Groups A and B) in patients with mild to moderate distal subungual onychomycosis of the target toenail.
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of onychomycosis of the target toenail (defined as one of the infected great toenails). Females who are pregnant, lactating or likely to become pregnant during the study.
